text: Takhana tamra sbajatira madhye yara abisbasa posana karechila tadera pradhanara balale -- ''se to tomadera mato ekajana manusa chara ara kichu naya, se tomadera upare pradhan'ya pratistha karate ca'iche. Bastutah allah yadi ca'itena tabe tini niscaya'i phirisâ€Œtadera pathate paratena. Amara to purbabartikalera amadera pitrpurusadera madhye emanata suni ni.
